product_name: Sherpani Prima LE Cross-Body Purse - Women's
long_description: The Sherpani Prima LE Cross-Body Purse combines great looks with slender, lightweight construction to carry your daily essentials in sweet and comfortable style. Zippered main compartment; external open pocket and zippered pockets. Adjustable shoulder strap. Sherpani Prima LE Cross-Body Purse features silicone-coated ripstop-nylon paneling.
short_description: The Sherpani Prima LE Cross-Body Purse combines great looks with slender, lightweight construction to carry your daily essentials in sweet and comfortable style.
